column5: Buddy and myself got out yesterday to do some Perchin and Whitie fishing, Started out at Lefroy, moved about a dozen times. Buddy picked up about 30 keeper Perch to take home. I tried with the jig and only talked up a half dozen. Minnows did the trick. Left there around noon, headed to Innisfil for Whities. Right off the bat buddy had one on, lost it about 20 feet up. Marked lots for a while but no takers. We moved to a few other holes and started to mark fish, I dropped my jig down and WHAM what a hog, I think it's my biggest Whitie ever. 27" got to go 7 to 8 LBS. We gaffed it up pretty bad, trying to get it up the small hole, we kept missing. Man did that fish fight, but we won out.
Great to see you out enjoying winter Fishfarmer !
Awesome Fish Farmer Congrats on your PB White Thanks for sharing Leechman
Yep, thats a big whitie for sure. My biggest is 27" as well, and it was almost 9lbs.......fat sucker!!  S.
